system.effect:
Elves call the stuff White Death. Most prevalent drug in the world, and lemme tell ya, nothin’ ya wanna get involved with. A fisstech addict’s a scary thing—not an ounce of fear or dignity when the cravings catch ‘em.

Fisstech sends those who snort it or rub it on their gums into a euphoric trance-like state. It is often used as an anesthetic, as it numbs pain. It is highly addictive. After each use, make an Endurance check at a DC: 18. If you fail, you become addicted.
